src:
GA-140: Jam Tangan yang Terinspirasi Pemutar Musik 90-an
03 Nov 2019, 19:29 by Immanuel Christian


GA-140: Jam Tangan yang Terinspirasi Pemutar Musik 90-an

KBRN, Jakarta: G-SHOCK kembali memperkenalkan serangkaian jam tangan analog-digital yaitu seri GA-140 yang dirancang dengan napas retro. Terinspirasi dari gaya 90an GA-140 menawarkan cangkang dan strap besar sama seperti pendahulunya yaitu seri GA-100 dan GA-110. Perbedaan mendasar dengan GA-100 atau GA-110 terletak pada dial yang terlihat lebih dalam yang inspirasinya diambil dari model alat pemutar musik elektronik era 90-an seperti walkman dan boombox." Jika diperhatikan dial pada GA-140 memang terlihat lebih dalam dibandingkan pendahulunya. Kedua panel digital berbentuk bundar yang dibuat berjajar pada bidang dial mengambil inspirasi dari modal lingkaran pada panel speaker boombox yang menjadi tren di era itu," ujar Marketing Manager, Casio Singapore Jakarta Representative Office, Riry Silalahi, dalam keterangan di Jakarta, Minggu (3/11/2019).Dial ini memiliki analog subdial di arah jam 3 yang berfungsi sebagai stopwatch 1/1000 yang memiliki kemampuan Chronographic termasuk di dalamnya elapsed time, split time, dan lap time. Selain itu ada dua dial dengan tampilan waktu digital pada posisi jam 12 dan tampilan tanggal pada posisi jam 6. GA-140 tetap mempertahankan ketangguhan dan ketahanannya terhadap guncangan tahan tekanan air hingga 200 m dan memiliki lampu LED untuk penerangan jam.GA-140 dirilis dengan 5 varian warna yaitu hitam, biru, merah-abu, ungu, dan hitam dengan aksen merah dan oranye. Jam ini dibandrol dengan harga ritel yang disarankan yaitu Rp. 2.079.000 dan bisa diperoleh di toko-toko resmi Casio di seluruh Indonesia.
text:
GA-140: Wristwatches Inspired by 90's Music Players
Nov 03 2019, 19:29 by Immanuel Christian


GA-140: Wristwatches Inspired by 90's Music Players

KBRN, Jakarta: G-SHOCK has re-introduced a series of analog-digital watches, the GA-140 series, which are designed with a retro breath. Inspired by the style of the 90s GA-140 offers a large shell and strap the same as its predecessor the GA-100 and GA-110 series. The fundamental difference with the GA-100 or GA-110 lies in the dial that looks deeper whose inspiration is taken from the models of electronic music players of the 90s such as walkman and boombox. "If you pay attention to the dial on the GA-140 does look deeper than its predecessor. The two circular digital panels made in a line on the dial field take inspiration from the circular capital on the boombox speaker panel that became a trend in that era, "said Marketing Manager, Casio Singapore Jakarta Representative Office, Riry Silalahi, in a statement in Jakarta, Sunday (3 / 11/2019). This dial has a subdial analog in the 3 o'clock direction that functions as a 1/1000 stopwatch that has Chronographic capabilities including elapsed time, split time, and lap time. In addition there are two dials with a digital time display at the 12 o'clock position and a date display at the 6 o'clock position. The GA-140 retains its toughness and resistance to water-resistant shocks up to 200 m and has LED lights for the lighting of the clock .GA-140 was released with 5 color variants, namely black, blue, red-gray, purple, and black with red and orange accents. This hour is priced at the suggested retail price of Rp. 2,079,000 and can be obtained at official Casio stores throughout Indonesia.
